title: Siobhan Baillie – 2022 Comments on the Fracking Vote
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Siobhan Baillie, the Conservative MP for Stroud, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: Environmental issues are hugely important to my constituents. I abstained on the vote last night, knowing the potential consequences. For those asking whether I am still a Conservative MP – I don’t know but I hope so.
